title: nIlOtpalAmbikAyAstava
sahitya:
nIlOtpalAmbikAyAstava dAsOham shrI


anupallavi

 nIlAmbarAnujAyAh nirupama padAmbujAyAh nIlakaNThArdha sharIriNyAh nikhilalOka jananyAh


caraNam   mAyAmALavagauLAdi dEsha prakAshinyAh mAtanga vadanEndrAdi pUjita varadAyinyAh
mAyAmaya vishvOtpati sthitilaya kAraNAyAh mAdhuryAmrta dhAra mahAdEva guruguha pAshinyAh
